page.title: 14A Day in the Life of Paul
page.content:
A Saturday
I get up at 8.00 and get washed and dressed and go downstairs for breakfast. I have toast and a cup of tea. While my Dad goes shopping I watch television. When he comes back I go outside to play football until dinner time. For dinner we have hot dogs and yoghurt. After washing the pots we go to the fishing tackle shop to get some meggots and then my dad and I go fishing for about two hours. When we go home and my Mum and sister return from we have tea. After tea we watch T>V> and my dad and I go to the sweet shop. After all that I go to bed in the bunk beds my dad made for me.
